description: Uses the Remez algorithm to calculate the FIR filter weights for a bandpass filter; results are written to stdout in an unadorned (no header) column of numbers.

fbot.title: Low Passband Frequency
fbot.description: Lowest frequency in the pass band.

ftop.title: High Passband Frequency
ftop.description: Highest frequency in the pass band, must be higher than fbot and <= 0.5/TR.

ntap.title: Number of Taps
ntap.description: Number of filter weights (AKA 'taps') to use, must be in the range 8..2000 (inclusive).

tr.title: Time Grid Spacing
tr.description: Set time grid spacing to 'dd' [default is 1.0]

alternative_band.title: Alternative Passband
alternative_band.description: Alternative way to specify the passband

alternative_ntap.title: Alternative Number of Taps
alternative_ntap.description: Alternative way to specify the number of taps
